description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. SteamSunk is a 3D top-down shooter with arena based game-play. The game is set in a sea environment, with the player controlling a ship and the enemies represented by various flying machines which try to sink you. With random power-ups and levels, super-weapons, bosses and much more your SteamSunk experience is different each time.
